text:
The cost of administration of the allocation set aside pursuant to Section 
515.01(b)(3)(E) of San Francisco Business and Tax Regulation Code Article 7 ("Tax on Transient Occupancy of Hotel Rooms") shall not exceed 8 percent. 
(Amended by Ord. 303-80, App. 6/27/80; amended by Ord. 243-00, File No. 001309, App. 10/27/2000)

heading.title: 24A
heading.catch_text: PROVIDING FOR ADMINISTRATION AND EXPENDITURES RELATING THERETO.
